description: If your weekly total points is greater than my total points, I will pay you $5.  If your weekly total points is less than my total points, you will pay me $5.  If our weekly total points are the same (i.e. a tie), I will pay you $5.
BET TWO:  Terry says, If I score less than 120 points, I pay you $10.  If I score more than or equal to 120 points, you pay me $5.
Bet 1: Terry says, You beat me in totsl points i pay you $5. If we tie, i pay you $5.
Terry says, If I beat you, you owe me $5.  If you beat me, I owe you $5.  If we tie, I owe you $5.
Most points wins five dollars, ties are a push.
Most points wins five dollars, ties are a push.
Most points wins 5, ties are a push
Terry is giving a 1 point spread plus ties go to me.
You beat me, you get $5 from me.  I beat you, I get $5 from you. If we tie, I pay you $5.
Team with highest score wins 5 dollars, Terry pays 5 on ties.
Team with highest score wins five dollars.
